attractions.name: Riverside Park
attractions.description: Beautiful 50-acre park with walking trails, picnic areas, and a scenic river view.

attractions.name: City Museum
attractions.description: Explore our city's rich history through interactive exhibits and artifacts.

attractions.name: Downtown Plaza
attractions.description: The heart of our city with shops, restaurants, and frequent community events.

attractions.name: Lakeview Golf Course
attractions.description: 18-hole championship course with stunning lake views and excellent facilities.

attractions.name: Performing Arts Center
attractions.description: State-of-the-art venue hosting concerts, plays, and cultural events year-round.

attractions.name: Historic District
attractions.description: Preserved 19th century architecture with boutique shops and guided tours available.

attractions.name: Science Discovery Center
attractions.description: Interactive science museum perfect for families with hands-on exhibits.

attractions.name: Mountain View Trail
attractions.address: Trailhead at Canyon Rd, Your City
attractions.description: Scenic hiking trail with panoramic views of the surrounding mountains.
